headline: Here’s Why Weitz Large Cap Equity Fund Trimmed Charter Communications (CHTR)
summary: Weitz Investment Management, an investment management firm, released its “Large Cap Equity Fund” third-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the third quarter, the fund’s Institutional Class returned 7.84% compared to a +6.08% return for the Russell 1000 Index. As AI fever subsided, stock gains were widespread. Value […]
